com.forgerock.opendj.util

Class ASCIICharProp

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.forgerock.opendj.util.ASCIICharProp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<ASCIICharProp>

    public final class ASCIICharProp
extends Object
implements Comparable<ASCIICharProp>
    A ASCIICharProp provides fast access to ASCII character properties. In particular, the ability to query whether a character is a letter, a digit, hexadecimal character, as well as various methods for performing character conversions.

    The methods in this class do not perform memory allocations nor calculations and so can be used safely in high performance situations.

    • Method Detail

      • valueOf

        public static ASCIICharProp valueOf(char c)
        Returns the character properties for the provided ASCII character. If a non-ASCII character is provided then this method returns null.
        Parameters:
        c - The ASCII character.
        Returns:
        The character properties for the provided ASCII character, or null if c is greater than  .

      • valueOf

        public static ASCIICharProp valueOf(int c)
        Returns the character properties for the provided ASCII character. If a non-ASCII character is provided then this method returns null.
        Parameters:
        c - The ASCII character.
        Returns:
        The character properties for the provided ASCII character, or null if c is less than zero or greater than  .

      • isKeyChar

        public boolean isKeyChar(boolean allowCompatChars)
        Indicates whether the char value associated with this ASCIICharProp is a keychar as defined in RFC 4512. A keychar is a letter, a digit, or a hyphen. When allowCompatChars is true the following illegal characters will be permitted: 
         HYPHEN  = %x2D ; hyphen ("-")
 DOT     = %x2E ; period (".")
 EQUALS  = %x3D ; equals sign ("=")
 USCORE  = %x5F ; underscore ("_")
        Parameters:
        allowCompatChars - true if certain illegal characters should be allowed for compatibility reasons.
        Returns:
        true if the char value associated with this ASCIICharProp is a keychar.

      • isLetter

        Indicates whether the char value associated with this ASCIICharProp is a letter.
        Returns:
